body:
The TL hates Shotas?. 
BASED

@supperisnotREADY!

YES and NO.

For current figures, yes Japan has overtaken China in that regard but @MoanChomsky is also not wrong when saying that as well since Japan only became #1 just recently or to be specific since May 2019. 
Prior to May 2019, it has always been China and making the assumption that China holds the most US debt, though outdated, isn't exactly wrong as well. Here's some info for you:

https://howmuch.net/articles/foreign-holders-of-us-debt-2020

The reason this is so is because of Orange Man or sometimes called daddy Trump specifically his trade war with China which saw a sharp decline in trade figures between the two countries and massive losses (for both countries) as well and also a somewhat short rise in earnings (in regards to trade with China) for the US during the years in between 2018-2019.

In terms of economic competitiveness- Communist China owns more of the US debt than any country. Our economy WAY past the point of no return, our interest payment is already much bigger than our GDP.  Now its just a controlled downward spiral until China decides to stop paying our stimulus checks and subsidizing various industries, paying for police & firemen, etc. All that "socialist stuff" thats run by the gov't.  At that point, we start threatening other countries for money with our nukes, like a schoolyard bully cornering a nerd.  Around then (2055) Islam will finally surpass Christians- their growth rate is off the charts. Buddhists die out.(negative growth right now.) China has even more surveillance than we do. The problem isn't any particular economic system, its that human tribal instincts promote greed, violence, and superstitions. Even capitalism would be cool if we could just be chill for once. . try not to start the next holocaust and shit.  It'd make Jesus happy.

@loliconvict I don't really think Communism needs defending. I mean, they took care of the Nazi problem (temporarily) .. 80% of Nazi soldiers were on the Eastern Front (eg killed by "Ivan the Red").  It wasn't technically a religious war, but 97% of Nazis were Christian.. didn't really take Russian Civvies prisoner, because they were already overstretched logistically. So they killed ~38 mil (mostly) atheist civilians. Not very Christian of those Nazis. Anyway Ivan did a bit of Civvie killing himself in retaliation. But only a few mil. If I were him, Ide have killed each and every single German alive. I would have felt really bad afterwards about it though.
ah.. i do love ntr but this is just total trash. good loli is wasted. such lame story and short page.
